Class QuadInternalNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuadInternalNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuadNode
    public class QuadInternalNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuadNode
    QuadInternalNode object implement QuadNode interface to represent the internal node of PRQuadtree.
    Version:
    2021-10-16
    Author:
    Ting-Jui Hsu

      • insert

        public QuadPackage insert​(Point point,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          int dimension)
        Insert the point into current QuadNode. The internal node will choose the suitable sub-region and pass the insertion commend down to a leaf.
        Specified by:
        insert in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        point - the Point wished to be inserted
        x - the x-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        y - the y-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        dimension - the dimension of the current QuadNode
        Returns:
        a QuadPackage carrying current QuadNode and inserted Point

      • remove

        public QuadPackage remove​(Point point,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          int dimension)
        Remove the point into current QuadNode. The internal node will choose the suitable sub-region and pass the removal commend down to a leaf. The leaf will be merged if there
        Specified by:
        remove in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        point - the Point wished to be removed
        x - the x-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        y - the y-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        dimension - the dimension of the current QuadNode
        Returns:
        a QuadPackage carrying current QuadNode and removed Point

      • search

        public java.util.List<Point> search​(java.lang.String name)
        search the points with specific name. The internal node will traverse all children to find the points with specific name.
        Specified by:
        search in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        name - the target name
        Returns:
        a List of Point with the specific name

      • regionsearch

        public int regionsearch​(int regionX,
                        int regionY,
                        int regionW,
                        int regionH,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int dimension)
        Search and print the points contained in the specific region. The method will cut the region up to 4 legal sub-region and pass down to the next level.
        Specified by:
        regionsearch in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        regionX - the x-coordinate of the target region
        regionY - the y-coordinate of the target region
        regionW - the width of the target region
        regionH - the height of the target region
        x - the x-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        y - the y-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        dimension - the dimension of the current QuadNode
        Returns:
        the number of visited nodes

      • duplicates

        public void duplicates()
        search and print the duplicated coordinates. The internal node will traverse all children to print the duplicated coordinates.
        Specified by:
        duplicates in interface QuadNode

      • dump

        public int dump​(java.lang.String header,
                int x,
                int y,
